title: High mark
creator_credit: Jack S. Allan, Australian Football Council and Australian National Film Board
brief_description: A record of the 1947 Grand Final match between two league teams - Carlton and Essendon. The game is fought to an exciting finish, with only one point between the winning and losing team - Carlton 86 points to Essendon 85 points. Narrated by Eric Welch
creator_credit_for_label: Jack S. Allan, Australian Football Council and Australian National Film Board
